com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.controller

Class SCUIXAPIMashupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.controller.SCUIController
      • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.controller.SCUIXAPIMashupController

  • public class SCUIXAPIMashupController
extends SCUIController
    This class can be used as controller class which would be invoking XAPI mashups.

      • onExecute

        protected final void onExecute(SCUIControllerObject controllerObj,
                               org.w3c.dom.Element input,
                               SCUIContext uiContext)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method implements abstract method of SCUIAction. Internally this method calls #validateMashup(SCUIContext, boolean), #massageInput(Element, SCUIContext), #invokeMashup(Element, SCUIContext), and #massageOutput(Element, SCUIContext) methods. These methods can be extended in any class extending this class. Exception SCUIAction#onExecute(SCUIContext)
        Specified by:
        onExecute in class SCUIController
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • validateMashups

        protected boolean validateMashups(SCUIXAPIControllerObject xapiControllerObj,
                                  SCUIContext uiContext,
                                  boolean throwEx)
        This method validates mashup id provided as struts parameter. Currently this method just checks for a value; and does not do any real validation on mashup id. Any class extending this class can extend this method and write custom logic. uiContext throwEx pass true if this method should throw exception if validation fails. true if validation is successful.

      • getMashupInput

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,org.w3c.dom.Element> getMashupInput(SCUIXAPIControllerObject xapiControllerObj,
                                                                                 SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                                                 org.w3c.dom.Element controllerInput)
        This method is protected and currently fetches input from the request. Any class extending SCUIXAPIMashupController can extend this method and write custom logic of massaging input before actual XAPI mashup is called. uiContext is of type SCUIContext input element Exception

      • authorizeMashupRef

        protected void authorizeMashupRef(SCUIXAPIControllerObject xapiControllerObj,
                                  java.lang.String mashupRefId,
                                  SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method authorizes user against resourceId provided in action definition. If not resourceId is provided, authorization check is skipped.
        If authorization fails, a SCUIAuthorizationException is thrown; if successful a Boolean attribute SCUIConstants#STRUTS_ACTION_AUTHORIZED is set on the uiContext. uiContext
